name: From Earth to Pluto
description:
Golfing across the Solar System. Tee off from Earth on a physics ridden journey to Pluto.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Adjust direction of shot
  • Space Bar - Start the 3-press golf power/accuracy meter.

Update: I made it a little easier to hit Pluto. It's gravity had the tendency to throw you back out into space.
